content:
As per the discussion on the 2022-03-01 Financial Management Workgroup call we are proposing the following block vote to be voted on 2022-03-08 Block-Vote-1 :
You may withdraw any item from the block vote by responding to this thread with the specific Key for the item you wish to withdraw or do so on the FM WG call prior to the vote.

Jira search string: project = "FHIR Specification Feedback" AND Specification = "US CARIN Blue Button (FHIR) [FHIR-us-carin-bb]" AND created >= 2021-12-01 AND Grouping = Block-Vote-2 ORDER BY updated DESC

Issue key Summary Proposed Resolution Reporter
FHIR-35146 Vision EOB as type or subtype Persuasive Scott Robertson
FHIR-34916 Network indicator for Pharmacy EOB Persuasive Scott Robertson
FHIR-35766 Change unauthenticated request error requirement in CapabilityStatement Persuasive Corey Spears
FHIR-35710 Remove MS from Patient.address.district Persuasive Corey Spears
FHIR-35708 FHIR US Core 3.1 is required for payers to support CMS regulation Persuasive Corey Spears
FHIR-35361 Ensure that examples validate against C4BB-ExplanationOfBenefit profile Persuasive Josh Mandel
FHIR-34784 Change note for item.productOrService Persuasive with Modification Eric Haas
FHIR-34504 ExplanationOfBenefit.meta.profile specifies a slicing discriminator pattern on $this and is missing in supportedProfile Persuasive Paul Bastide

@Eric Haas @Scott Robertson @Paul Bastide @Corey Spears
